tools.Name: Backlight
tools.Description: With collaboration between developers and designers at heart, Backlight is a complete coding platform where teams build, document, publish, scale, and maintain Design Systems. The free plan allows up to 3 editors to work on one design system with unlimited viewers.

tools.Name: BoxySVG
tools.Description: A free installable Web app for drawing SVGs and exporting in SVG, PNG, jpeg, and other formats.

tools.Name: Fffuel

tools.Name: Circum Icons

tools.Name: HeroIcons

tools.Name: CleverBrush
tools.Description: Free Graphics Design / Photo Collage App. Also, they offer paid integration of it as a component.

tools.Name: CloudConvert
tools.Description: Convert anything to anything. Two hundred eight supported formats including videos and gifs.

tools.Name: Solo Learn
tools.Description: A cloud programming playground well-suited for running code snippets. Supports various programming languages. No registration is required for running code, but it is necessary when saving code on their platform. Also offers free courses for beginners and intermediate-level coders.

tools.Name: Play with Docker
tools.Description: A simple, interactive, fun playground to learn Docke

tools.Name: Canister
tools.Description: 20 free private repositories for developers, 30 free private repositories for teams to build and store Docker images

tools.Name: Container Registry Service
tools.Description: Harbor based Container Management Solution. The free tier offers 1 GB of storage for private repositories.

tools.Name: Docker Hub
tools.Description: One free private repository and unlimited public repositories to build and store Docker images

tools.Name: Quay
tools.Description: Build and store container images with unlimited free public repositories

tools.Name: Qonversion
tools.Description: All-in-one cross-platform subscription management platform offering analytics, A/B testing, Apple Search Ads, remote configs, and growth tools for optimizing in-app purchases and monetization. Compatible with iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Unity, Cordova, Stripe, and web. Free up to $10k in monthly tracked revenue.

tools.Name: Glassfy
tools.Description: n-app subscriptions infrastructure, real-time subscription events and out-of-the-box monetization tools on iOS, Android, Stripe and Paddle. Free up to $10k monthly revenue.

tools.Name: Adapty
tools.Description: One-stop solution with open-source SDK for mobile in-app subscription integration to iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Unity, or web app. Free up to $10k monthly revenue.

tools.Name: MailPopin
tools.Description: Get the most of your Stripe notifications with contextualized information.

tools.Name: RevenueCat
tools.Description: Hosted backend for in-app purchases and subscriptions (iOS and Android). Free up to $2.5k/mo in tracked revenue.

tools.Name: Moesif
tools.Description: Generate revenue from APIs via usage-based billing. Connect to Stripe, Chargebee, etc. The free tier offers 30,000 events/month.

tools.Name: Nami ML
tools.Description: Complete platform for in-app purchases and subscriptions on iOS and Android, including no-code paywalls, CRM, and analytics. Free for all base features to run an IAP business.

tools.Name: CoinMarketCap
tools.Description: Provides cryptocurrency market data including the latest crypto and fiat currency exchange rates. The free tier offers 10K call credits/month

tools.Name: CurrencyFreaks
tools.Description: Provides current and historical currency exchange rates. Free DEVELOPER plan available with 1000 requests/month.

tools.Name: CoinGecko
tools.Description: ovides cryptocurrency market data including the latest crypto exchange rates and historical data. The demo api comes with a stable rate limit of 30 calls/min and a monthly cap of 10,000 calls.

tools.Name: CurrencyApi
tools.Description: Live Currency Rates for Physical and Cryptocurrencies, delivered in JSON and XML. The free tier offers 1,250 API requests/month.

tools.Name: Currencylayer
tools.Description: Reliable Exchange Rates and Currency Conversion for your Business, 100 API requests/month free.

tools.Name: Exchange Rate API
tools.Description: An easy-to-use currency conversion JSON API. The free tier updates once per day with a limit of 1,500 requests/month.

tools.Name: FraudLabsPRO
tools.Description: Help merchants to prevent payment fraud and chargebacks. Free Micro Plan available with 500 queries/month.

tools.Name: fxRatesAPI
tools.Description: Provides real-time and historical exchange rates. The free tier requires attribution.

tools.Name: CurrencyApi
tools.Description: Free currency conversion and exchange rate data API. Free 300 requests per month, 10 requests per minute for private use.
